full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,'PHAGS PA DE BZHIN GSHEGS PA'I GTZUG TOR NAS BYUNG BA'I GDUGS NAG MO CAN ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @013A *, ,BCOM LDAN 'DAS KYIS GZUNGS CHEN PO 'DI BKA' STZAL PA DANG, ,LHA THAMS CAD DANG, ,DGE SLONG THAMS CAD DANG, LHA DANG, KLU DANG LHA MA YIN DANG, MI DANG, GNOD SBYIN THAMS CAD DANG, NAM MKHA' LDING DANG, ,DRI ZAR BCAS PA'I 'JIG RTEN YI RANG STE, BCOM LDAN 'DAS KYIS GSUNGS PA LA @013B MNGON PAR BSTOD DO, ,'PHAGS PA DE BZHIN GSHEGS PA GTZUG TOR NAS BYUNG BA'I GDUGS NAG MO CAN ZHES BYA BA'I GZUNGS RDZOGS S+HO, ,SARBA MANGGA LAm, ,
